verses.content: Chun, ni saria ni hmasatakah, zîngkâr, khuo a lân thim laiin, Mari Magdalin chu thlâna chun a va feh a, lung chu thlâna inthawka lâk sawnin a hmuh a.
Chuongchun, a tlân a, Simon Peter le inchûktir dang Isûn a ihmangai kuoma chun a hung a, an kuomah, “Thlâna inthawk khan Lalpa chu an fe hmangpui tah, an siena chin hrim kan hriet nawh,” a ta.
Chuongchun, Peter chu a suok a, inchûktir dang le chun; chun, thlântieng an pan tah a.
An tlân rêl a, inchûktir dang chun Peter a lekhêl a, thlân chu a tlung hmasah a.
A kûn a, a bih a, puon zai inhmi um chu a hmuh a; nisienlakhawm, a sûngah a lût nawh.
Chun, Simon Peter khawmin a hnungah a hung hnawt phâk a, thlân sûngah a lût a; puon zai inhmihai um le
a lua inhrûkna puon um chu, puon zai inhmihai laia um loin, ziel sain hmun tuma um a hmuh a.
Chuongchun, inchûktir dang, thlân tlung hmasapa khawm chu a lût veh a, a hmuh a, a awi a.
Mithi laia inthawkin a thonâwk ding a ni ti Pathien Lekha Thu kha an la hriet si nawh a.
Chuongchun, inchûktirhai chu anni inah an fe nâwk tah a.
Nisienlakhawm, Mari chu tuol- ah thlân kâwla chun ṭap pumin a ngîr a; chuongchun, ṭap pumin a kûn a, thlân sûng chu a bih a;
chun, vântirko pahni puon vâr silin, Isu ruong inzâlna hmuna chun, pakhat a lu tieng, pakhat a ke tienga ṭhung a hmuh a.
Anni chun a kuomah, “Nuhmei, iengdinga i ṭap am?” an ta. Ama chun an kuomah, “Ka Lalpa an fe- hmangpui a, an siena chin ka hriet naw leiin,” a ta.
Chun, chuonga a hril phingleh a hnung tieng a nghah a, Isu ngîr chu a hmuh a, Isu a ni ti a hriet si nawh a.

Isûn a kuomah, “Nuhmei, ieng- dinga i ṭap am? Tû am i zawng a?” a ta. Ama chun huon enkawltu amanih a tih a, a kuomah, “Pu, ama hitaka inthawka i fepui a ni chun i siena chin mi hril rawh, chuongchun lâng ka tih,” a ta.
Isûn a kuomah, “Mari,” a tih a. Ama chu a nghah a, a kuomah, Hebrai ṭawngin, “Rabboni,” a ta; (chu chu Inchûktirtu tina a nih.)

Chun, Isûn a kuomah, “Mi chel naw rawh, tu chen khawmin Pa kuomah ka la hang fe nawh; amiruokchu, ka unauhai kuomah va fe la, an kuomah, ‘Ka pa, in Pa, Ka Pathien, in Pathien kuomah ka lâwn ding a nih,’ a tih, va ti rawh,” a ta.
Mari Magdalin chu a va feh a, închûktirhai kuomah, “Lalpa chu kan hmu tah,” a ta, a kuoma thu a hrilziehai khawm chu a hril a.

Chun, chu ni, ni saria ni hmasatakah, khuo a hung inhnu chun, Judahai ṭi leia inchûktirhai umna kawtkhârhai chu khâr a ni hnungin, Isu anni lai a hung ngîr a, an kuomah, “In chungah thla- muongna um raw se,” a ta.
Chu chu a hril zo chun, a kut le a nâk an kuomah ân entir a. Chun, Lalpa chu an hmu chun inchûktirhai chu an lâwm tah a.
Chun, Isûn an kuomah, “In chungah thlamuongna um raw se, Pain kei a mi tir ang bawkin ka tir cheu hi,” a ti nâwk a.
Chun, chuong thu chu a hril zoin, an chungah ân thuok a, an kuomah, “Thlarau Inthieng nei ro,
tu suol khawm in ngaidam taphawt chu ngaidam nîng a tih; tu suol khawm in ngaidam naw taphawt chu, ngaidam naw nîng a tih,” a ta.
Chun, Isu a hung lai khan, sâwm le pahnihai laia ṭhang ve Thoma (Didum an ti bawk) chu an kuomah a um ve nawh a.

Chuongchun, inchûktir danghai chun a kuomah, “Lalpa chu kan hmu tah,” an ta. Nisienlakhawm, ama chun an kuomah, “A kuta thîr kilna serhai kha ka hmuh a, thîr kilna serhaia chun ka kut pârhai ka khîk lûta, a nâka ka pur meu naw chun, ring naw ning,” a ta.

Chun, ni riet hnungah, a inchûktirhai chu in sûngah an um nâwk a, Thoma khawm an kuomah a um veh a. Chun, Isu a hung a, kawthai chu khâr a ni sih a, anni lai a hung ngîr tah a, an kuomah, “In chungah thlamuongna um raw se,” a ta.
Chun, Thoma kuoma chun, “I kut pârin hang them la, ka kuthai en rawh; i kut hang ban la, ka nak pur rawh; ring loin um naw la, ring el rawh,” a ta.
Thoman a kuomah, “Ka Lalpa le ka Pathien i nih,” a ta, a dawn a.
Isûn a kuomah, “Nangin kei i mi hmu leiin i ring a ni maw? Hmu loa ring taphawthai chu an hamṭha,” a ta.
Chun, Isûn inchûktirhai hmaah inchikna dang tamtak a thaw ṭeu a, chuonghai chu hi lekhabua hin ziek a ni nawh.
Nisienlakhawm, hieng hi, Isu chu, Krista, Pathien Naupa a nih ti in ringna ding le, in ring a, a hminga hringna in neina dinga ziek a nih.
